items.title: Umno firmly against any 'back door' move to topple unity govt, says Zahid
items.summary: PETALING JAYA: Umno will remain in the unity government until the next general election and will not entertain any "back door" attempt to bring down the administration, says party president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi. Read full story

items.title: Senior Melaka immigration officer, wife, two officers arrested for corruption
items.summary: MELAKA: A senior officer from the Melaka Immigration Department, his wife and two other enforcement officers have been remanded for six days for allegedly accepting bribes to protect commercial premises employing illegal immigrants. Read full story

items.title: Nvidia announces DLSS 4.5 with 6x Frame Generation and improved image quality

DLSS 4.5 includes Nvidia's second-generation Super Resolution transformer model and a new 6x Multi Frame Generation mode for RTX 50-series GPUs that uses AI to generate up to five additional frames for every single rendered one. items.title: Autel MaxiCharger AC Elite Home 50A Smart AI Level 2 EV Charger hits new $450 low (Save $149)
items.summary:
Through the official Autel Amazon storefront, you can pick up the brand’s upgraded MaxiCharger AC Elite Home 50A Smart AI Level 2 EV Charger with an in-body holster for $450 shipped, which is sold out directly from the brand’s website. This upgraded AI-supported model spent most of 2025 keeping at its $599 MSRP, which we spotted dropping down to $529 last week, and is falling even lower from that rate today. You’re looking at a 25% markdown here that cuts $149 off the going rate, giving you one of the brand’s more advanced means to charge your EV at a new all-time low price. Of course, you can find the slightly less advanced Sierra Blue and Snow White Home counterparts without onboard screens, still keeping to their $398 lows, for anyone wanting to save a bit more.

more…

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Hiboy MAX Pro Electric Scooter at $586.22 shipped, which beats out the direct website pricing by $71. It carries a full $1,000 MSRP, though you’re more likely to find it starting between $800 and $730 at Amazon, with discounts having kept costs above $612, except during the brand’s Black Friday and Christmas events that offered bonus savings codes to the $567 low. If you missed out in November and December, you’re getting the next-best rate here while up to $214 is cut from the tag, landing it at a new Amazon low while being the second-lowest overall price we have tracked.

What we love

items.title: CES 2026: 8BitDo just unleashed its pro-grade, fully customizable Ultimate 3E wireless Xbox controller
items.summary:
Alongside the teaser of its flip-style controller, 8BitDo has officially unveiled the new Ultimate 3E gamepad. This is an officially licensed wireless Xbox controller that builds on the company’s popular Ultimate 3-mode unit, adding a suite of features aimed squarely at serious, competitive players. While an exact launch date hasn’t been locked in yet, 8BitDo has confirmed the Ultimate 3E will arrive sometime in Q2 2026 with a price of $149.99 shipped. Head below for a closer look and more details.

more…

items.title: If you’ve got Prime, this rugged Ocean-style Apple Watch band is yours for just $8
items.summary:
Adorve Ocean Rugged Apple Watch Band

Buy for $8 (Reg. $10)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

While this is arguably not the flashiest Apple Watch band out there, I think that’s sort of the point. I personally like having a rugged and affordable band like this at the ready for when I’m going to tackle projects and the like. This way I won’t have to worry about damaging it.

items.title: EcoFlow’s current New Year flash sale offers the DELTA 3 Ultra Plus power station at a new $1,359 low, more from $229
items.summary:
As part of its freshly launched New Year Sale, EcoFlow also has a collection of flash offers with up to 61% savings, like the DELTA 3 Ultra Plus Portable Power Station at $1,359 shipped, which beats out its current Amazon pricing by $140. This new model hit the market with its many counterparts back in September and is coming down from its $2,899 MSRP here today, which we’ve mostly seen taken down to $1,499 in past sales, with a fall lower to $1,424 back during Black Friday. The deal here is only lasting until 3 a.m. PST and gives you an up to 53% markdown that cuts $1,540 off the tag for the lowest new price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it and the other flash offers while they are still around.

more…

items.title: LEGO takes the stage at CES 2026 to officially reveal new Smart Bricks and minifigs, Star Wars sets, more
items.summary:
Update: The new LEGO Smart Play and its first three sets go live for pre-order on January 9 – they are officially releasing on March 1.

After a brief and relatively cryptic official teaser hit LEGO’s social feeds over the last day or so, it has now officially hit the stage at CES 2026.

The brand is making even bigger waves, however, with the reveal of its new Solar Gazeebo that combines outdoor living with dual-purpose energy storage.
